# Ayaansh Mathur — Indian Youth Football Prodigy
> Official profile of Ayaansh Mathur, a 13-year-old football prodigy from Mumbai, India.

## Who is Ayaansh Mathur?
Ayaansh Mathur (born 6 September 2012, Mumbai, India) is one of India's most promising young footballers.
He has scored 540+ goals across 370+ matches and has represented India in international youth tournaments
across Spain, Sweden, and Singapore — all before the age of 13.

## Key Facts
- Full Name: Ayaansh Mathur
- Date of Birth: 6 September 2012
- Age: 13 years old
- Nationality: Indian
- City: Mumbai, Maharashtra, India
- Sport: Association Football (Soccer)
- Preferred Foot: Right
- Height: 162 cm | Weight: 43 kg
- Years of Training: 8 years
- Positions: Striker, Attacking Midfielder, Central Defensive Midfielder, Wing

## Career Statistics
- Total Matches: 370+
- Goals Scored: 540+ (approximately 1.5 goals per match)
- Man of the Match Awards: 55+
- Player of Tournament Awards: 20+
- International Tournaments: 5 (across 3 countries)

## Academies & Clubs
- SoccerStar Academy Mumbai (Head Coach: Ajit Sawant)
- FC Barcelona Academy Mumbai
- Real Madrid Foundation India (Coach: Shantanu Jain)
- Rudra Soccerstar

## International Tournament Experience
- **Singa Cup — Singapore** (2022 & 2024): Scored 10 goals across both editions
- **Barcelona World Cup — Spain** (2023): Competed vs Barcelona Italy, Catalunya, Japan, Jordan
- **Real Madrid World Cup — Spain** (2025 & 2026): Won Best Teamwork Award
- **Gothia Cup — Sweden** (2023): World's largest youth football tournament (80+ countries)

## Major Achievements & Titles
- TMFC Cup Champion — 2020
- Bayside Sports Cup Champion — 2022
- YSA MPL Winner — 2023
- DPDL Most Innovative Player — 2023
- MSSA School Top Scorer — 2023
- Nashik League Champion — 2024
- Mumbai U13 Inter-District Champions — 2024 & 2025
- Real Madrid World Cup Best Teamwork Award — 2025
- RFYC National Camp — Top 50 in India (National Level Recognition)

## Coach Testimonials
**Ajit Sawant** (Head Youth Coach, SoccerStar Academy Mumbai):
"Ayaansh Mathur is a standout footballer with excellent attacking instinct, tactical intelligence,
and exceptional versatility. His leadership both on and off the field, his technical skills with
the ball, and his finishing ability are qualities that separate him from many of his peers."

**Shantanu Jain** (Head Coach, Barcelona Academy Mumbai & Real Madrid Foundation):
"Ayaansh combines technical brilliance with a strong mental attitude, attributes crucial for a
professional career in football. His performance during international competitions displayed his
ability to adapt, compete internationally, and consistently perform under pressure."

## Skill Ratings (out of 100)
- Finishing: 95
- Attacking Movement: 95
- Game Understanding: 95
- Leadership: 96
- Confidence: 90
- Teamwork: 92
- Decision Making: 88
- Ball Control: 88
- Dribbling: 90
- Speed: 88

- Coordination: 85
- Motivation: 90
- Focus & Concentration: 87
- Endurance: 80
- Strength: 75
- 1v1 Attacking: 88
- 1v1 Defending: 72
- Tackling & Interceptions: 75
